title: The Coven
description: Daytona Bike Week. Biker’s paradise. The perfect place for Chad and Ariel Garrettto take a few days off and relax with Chad’s buddy Spike and Ariel’s little sister Stacy. But nothing ever goes as planned with that magical duo. Trouble just stalks them like a black cat. Maybe because a black cat is stalking them. A missing agent riding with an outlaw biker gang, a call from Chad’s past, and War-N-Wit, Inc.’s riding again. On Harleys!Don't miss the first two books in this exciting series.Book 1 - The Witch - http://www.amazon.com/dp/B007JVDT0G/r...Book 2 - Resurrection http://www.amazon.com/dp/B008I5CQ4W/r...
author: Gail Roughton
